books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: Detective Michael Bennett, back in New York City, investigates a peculiar crime in Harlem.
books.name: BURN

books.author: by Catherine Coulter and J. T. Ellison
books.description: Nicholas Drummond of Scotland Yard, now an F.B.I. agent, investigates a Wall Street stabbing that involves secrets reaching back to World War I.
books.name: THE LOST KEY

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Twenty-five years after their high school romance ended, two classmates return to their North Carolina town for a funeral.
books.name: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: Five interrelated families grapple with the events of the 1960s through the 1980s; Book 3 of the Century Trilogy.
books.name: EDGE OF ETERNITY

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: Claire Randall, an English nurse, is transported back to 1743 during a second honeymoon in the Scottish Highlands.
books.name: OUTLANDER

books.author: by Penelope Ward
books.description: A bond, and an attraction, between two stepsiblings.
books.name: STEPBROTHER DEAREST

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher, a former military cop, helps the State Department and the C.I.A. stop a sniper who has targeted a G8 summit.
books.name: PERSONAL

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: Volume 2 of the Outlander series, about an 18th-century Scottish warrior and a time-traveling World War II-era nurse; first published in 1992.
books.name: DRAGONFLY IN AMBER

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by Iris Johansen
books.description: A teenager with psychic abilities is rescued by a mysterious man who has a task for her.
books.name: THE PERFECT WITNESS

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: An unsuspecting accountant's wife makes a disturbing discovery; first published in 2010, now a movie.
books.name: A GOOD MARRIAGE

books.author: by Kristan Higgins
books.description: Will Emmaline's date to her ex-fiancé's wedding turn into more?
books.name: IN YOUR DREAMS

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman who, as a child, was spared when her mother and sisters were murdered begins to reinvestigate the case against her imprisoned brother.
books.name: DARK PLACES

books.author: by Harper Sloan
books.description: Emmy loves Maddox, but his demons may destroy both of them; a Corps Security novel.
books.name: LOCKE
